properties.entry: SELECT * FROM(SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM(SELECT NOTICE_NO ,USER_NO ,NOTICE_TITLE ,COUNT ,CREATE_DATE FROM NOTICE N JOIN MEMBER USING (USER_NO) WHERE N.STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC,NOTICE_NO DESC) A) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
UPDATE NOTICE SET NOTICE_TITLE = ? ,NOTICE_CONTENT = ? WHERE NOTICE_NO = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'
UPDATE NOTICE SET COUNT = COUNT + 1 WHERE NOTICE_NO = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT NOTICE_NO, NOTICE_TITLE, NOTICE_CONTENT, COUNT, CREATE_DATE FROM NOTICE WHERE NOTICE_NO = ? AND STATUS='Y'
UPDATE NOTICE SET STATUS='N' WHERE NOTICE_NO = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT NOTICE_NO, NOTICE_TITLE, CREATE_DATE, 'previous' AS post_position FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS rnum, NOTICE_NO, NOTICE_TITLE, CREATE_DATE FROM (SELECT NOTICE_NO, NOTICE_TITLE, CREATE_DATE FROM NOTICE WHERE STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC, NOTICE_NO DESC) ) WHERE rnum = (SELECT rnum - 1 FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS rnum, NOTICE_NO, NOTICE_TITLE, CREATE_DATE FROM ( SELECT NOTICE_NO, NOTICE_TITLE, CREATE_DATE FROM NOTICE WHERE STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC, NOTICE_NO DESC) ) WHERE NOTICE_NO = ?)
UNION
-- 다음 글 SELECT NOTICE_NO, NOTICE_TITLE, CREATE_DATE,'next' AS post_position FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS rnum, NOTICE_NO, NOTICE_TITLE, CREATE_DATE FROM (SELECT NOTICE_NO, NOTICE_TITLE, CREATE_DATE FROM NOTICE WHERE STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC, NOTICE_NO DESC )) WHERE rnum = (SELECT rnum + 1 FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS rnum, NOTICE_NO, NOTICE_TITLE, CREATE_DATE FROM (SELECT NOTICE_NO, NOTICE_TITLE, CREATE_DATE FROM NOTICE WHERE STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC, NOTICE_NO DESC)) WHERE NOTICE_NO = ?) ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC, NOTICE_NO DESC
SELECT * FROM(SELECT ROWNUM, A.* FROM (SELECT NOTICE_NO , NOTICE_TITLE , CREATE_DATE FROM NOTICE WHERE STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY CREATE_DATE ASC)A) WHERE ROWNUM BETWEEN 1 AND 4
SELECT FILE_NO ,ORIGIN_NAME ,CHANGE_NAME ,FILE_PATH FROM ATTACHMENT WHERE REF_NNO = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'
UPDATE ATTACHMENT SET STATUS='N' WHERE REF_NNO = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'
